edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class MessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.MessageSender

  • public class MessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates some specific methods to send messages from Message Sequences.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(Message msg,
                           java.lang.String messageUseID,
                           User toUser,
                           DataBank db,
                           EmailProperties emailProperties)
        looks up, compose, and send email message
        Parameters:
        msg - Message object to be sent to the User.
        messageUseID - The id used for generating URL which is unique to the user.
        toUser - User to whom the message has to be sent.
        db - Data bank object used from talking to DB.
        Returns:
        String Empty string if successful.

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(Message msg,
                           java.lang.String messageUseID,
                           EmailMessage emailMessage,
                           java.lang.String ssid,
                           DataBank db,
                           java.lang.String inviteeId,
                           EmailProperties emailProperties)
        Sends an email to the User.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message object to be sent to the User.
        messageUseID - The id used for generating URL which is unique to the user.
        toEmail - Email id to which message has to be sent.
        salutation - Salutation to address the invitee to whom email has to be sent.
        lastname - Last name of the invitee.
        ssid - Studyspace id for generation of the URL.
        db - Data bank object used from talking to DB.
        inviteeId - Id of the user to whom email has to be sent
        Returns:
        String Empty string if successful.

        This method tests sending messages.
        Parameters:
        msgText - Message test that has to be sent.
        Returns:
        String If the mail sending is successful or not.
